"Ah, so you came here too.":
"Rysas worked his whole life
trying to restore Kvaris."

"Day and night he scoured every bit of snow and ice,
searching for the answer as to \"What happened?\"."

"The past battle with Dark Falz,
and the sudden rapid climate change therein..."

"An enormous amount of data was left on terminals
like the ones at the lodge and Lost Central..."

"Particularly in Lost Central where, in addition
to data on the city's condition at the time..."

"...there were also plans on how to
get the city back up and running."

"Not to take back \"Lost Central\",
but to take back the \"First Central City\"."

"I think Ilma and his siblings are
continuing from where Rysas left off."
"Who knows how long it could take, though."
"Also, there's one more thing..."

"Rysas' reports contained
data about the Central Cannon."

"The ARKS of Kvaris also used that cannon
to fight off Dark Falz."

"According to a report, they were able to
get it to function at nearly 100% output."

"...It was an incomplete report on the
Central Cannon, found in the library."

"Even so, when Ilma found it,
it set things into motion."

"Ilma shared the files with Crawford and they
brainstormed together while working on their own research."

"During that process, they found
even more data within Lost Central..."

"And well,
we both know the rest."

"Now that we have all the data at our disposal, the
Central Cannon will likely see even more developments."

"...Once again, Rysas has helped
to build a better future."
"He was a great person."
"We'll carry on his wishes."

"He was... There are so many
amazing people here on Halpha."

"Indeed.
We certainly will..."
"Everyone's fighting so hard to survive."

"Not just for themselves,
but for their allies."

"Traveling everywhere with you and Aina,
we've met people from all walks of life."

"No matter how different their circumstances,
they've all had that one goal in common."

"\"What can I do for the
people of Halpha?\"..."

"That's a question
I continue to ask myself now."
